lead_paragraph: ROSENBERG--Irving, of Boca Raton, FL, formerly of Oceanside, NY died suddenly January 1, 2016. After distinguished WWII service in the Army Air Force, Irving began a lifelong career with CBS Television, retiring as Director of Film Services. Loving husband and best friend to Alice. Loving father to Amy and Neal, Jane and Walter. Adoring grandfather to Joshua, Jessica, Rachel, Evan, Hannah and Daniel. Doting great-grandfather to Jonah and Koby. 1/3
